message_1: Find all the quadratic residues of 19.
message_2:
A quadratic residue is an integer that is congruent to a perfect square modulo a given prime number. To find all the quadratic residues of 19, we will calculate the squares of the numbers from 1 to (19-1)/2, which is 1 to 9, and then find their remainders when divided by 19.

1. 1² = 1 (mod 19)
2. 2² = 4 (mod 19)
3. 3² = 9 (mod 19)
4. 4² = 16 (mod 19)
5. 5² = 25 ≡ 6 (mod 19)
6. 6² = 36 ≡ 17 (mod 19)
7. 7² = 49 ≡ 11 (mod 19)
8. 8² = 64 ≡ 7 (mod 19)
9. 9² = 81 ≡ 5 (mod 19)

The quadratic residues of 19 are: 1, 4, 9, 16, 6, 17, 11, 7, and 5.
